column3: Afei ɔka da kor a mobɔtɔr wɔ Saul nsamu: biribiara nnye mma me ma ɔnnsen dɛ mibefi nsa akɔ Filistiafo asaase do; na Saul n’enyidado a ɔwɔ mo ho bɛpa dɛ ɔbɔhwehwɛ me bio wɔ Israel ntoaado nyinara: nna mibefi ne nsamu efir."

column4: ɔno na mbarimba ahaesia a wɔka no ho no

column5: mpo David nye ne yernom beenu no

column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Saul dɛ David eguan kɔ Gat: na ɔannda ho annhwehwɛ no bio."

column3: Sɛ afei menya w’enyim enyimnyam a
column4: ma wɔmma me tsenabew bi wɔ ɔman mu nkurow no bi mu ma menkɛtsena hɔ; na bɛyɛ dɛn ntsi na w’akowaa nye wo bɛtsena ahenkurow mu?"

column2: "Nna Akis dze Ziklag maa no da no ara: dɛm ntsi na ɔdze bodu ndɛ ara Ziklag yɛ Juda ahemfo dze no."
"Na nda a David dze tsenaa Filistiafo hɔn man mu no yɛ afrenhyia ara mu
"Na David na ne mbarimba no sii mu kɔree
column5: na Amalekfo; iyinom nye asaase no do nkorɔfo a wofir tsetse a nkyɛ wɔtsetse beebi mbrɛ edze rokɔ Sur no
column6: ɔdze kodu Egypt asaase no do mpo."

column3: na oenngyaa ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa enyikan
Henfa na ndɛ hom kɔr ntuae? Na David see dɛ

column2: "Na David enngyaa ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa enyikan
column5: Bohu na wɔreka hɛn ho asɛm dɛ
column7: na mber a ɔtse Filistiafo hɔn man mu no nyinara n’adze a ɔyɛe ara nye no."

column4: Ɔayɛ ma no nkorɔfo Israel ekyir no kɔkɔɔkɔ: dɛm ntsi ɔbɛyɛ m’akowaa daa."
